ModMetaData.name: Craftable Molotov Cocktails
ModMetaData.author: KapTaiN_KaVerN
ModMetaData.description:
Just craftable Molotov cocktails, nothing less, nothing more.
They cost 50 chemfuel, 25 Cloth units and 1 Beer to produce (at the Crafting Spot)
////////////////////////About the cost////////////////////////
As I don't use them often, at first I had forget that one Molotov cocktail item means unlimited ammo. I had set the price to 5 cloth units and 1 beer but it was way too OP that way.
So i looked at the market values :
Molotov's cost 200 silver, Beer 9, Chemfuel 3 and cloth 1.5.
So I choose 1 beer (=9 silver), 50 units of chemfuel (=150 silver) and 25 cloth units (=37.5 silver) because it roughly make the same price (=196.5 silver) and even that way I found it too OP :p
////////////////////////////Thanks////////////////////////////
Came from this suggestion on Reddit :
https://www.reddit.com/r/RimWorld/comments/561xz4/beer_cloth_molotovs/
So thank you all out there !
